title: 280ZX Racecar 01: The 2023 Season
content:
Tï»¿he 2023 Vintage racing season for Doc B Racing consisted of 3 events at Watkins Glen, one entirely new car, and a plethora of lessons learned. After a multi-year hiatus from racing, it was the beginning of a triumphant return for the team.
